Class Histogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • Histogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Histogram
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Takes in a MediaMaker object and uses information gathered from that object to construct a histogram.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addRectangle

        private void addRectangle(java.awt.Graphics obj,
                          int year,
                          int startPointWidth,
                          int width)
        Adds bars split into a possibility of six categories to the histogram.
        Parameters:
        obj - The graphics object that the rectangles are to be added to.
        year - The year that the bar will display.
        startPointWidth - The point on the x-axis where the rectangle will start.
        width - The width of the rectangle.
